entry.title: Unlocking the Potent Earnings - Highest Paying Jobs in India's IT Sector - Skillslash
entry.summary: With a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 8.5%, the Indian IT and Business Process Management (BPM) industry crossed the impressive milestone of $200 billion in revenue in 2021, as reported by the National Association of Software and Service Companies (NASSCOM).

entry.title: Why is Discipline considered above everything else ? - Skillslash
entry.summary: Discipline is a word whose meaning can have no bounds to be blunt. Life without discipline is very much like a boat without radar.
